mapper.select: SELECT resource_id resourceid, resource_name resourcename, parent_resource_id parentresourceid, resource_url resourceurl, resource_type resourcetype, resource_order resourceorder FROM t_sys_resource WHERE resource_type = '1' AND parent_resource_id = #{resourceid} ORDER BY parent_resource_id, resource_order

SELECT resource_id resourceid, resource_name resourcename, parent_resource_id parentresourceid, resource_url resourceurl, resource_type resourcetype, resource_order resourceorder FROM t_sys_resource WHERE (resource_type = '1' OR RESOURCE_TYPE = '0') AND parent_resource_id = #{pId} ORDER BY resource_id
SELECT resource_id id, resource_name name, parent_resource_id pid FROM t_sys_resource WHERE resource_type = '1' OR RESOURCE_TYPE = '0' ORDER BY parent_resource_id, resource_order

SELECT resource_id id, resource_name || decode(remark, '', '', '('||remark||')') name, parent_resource_id pid FROM t_sys_resource WHERE resource_type = '1' OR RESOURCE_TYPE = '0' ORDER BY parent_resource_id, resource_order

SELECT resource_id resourceid, resource_name resourcename, parent_resource_id parentresourceid, resource_url resourceurl, resource_type resourcetype, resource_order resourceorder, SYSTEM, remark FROM t_sys_resource WHERE resource_id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_sys_resource SET resource_name = #{resourcename}, resource_url = #{resourceurl}, resource_order = #{resourceorder}, change_time = #{changeTime}, change_dept = #{changeDept}, changer = #{changer}, system = #{system}, remark = #{remark}, RESOURCE_TYPE = #{resourcetype} WHERE resource_id = #{resourceid}
mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_resource (resource_id, parent_resource_id, resource_type, creator, create_time, create_dept, resource_name, resource_url, resource_order, valid_flag, SYSTEM, remark) values ('${resourceid}', '${parentresourceid}', '${resourcetype}', '${creator}', sysdate, '${createDept}', '${resourcename}', '${resourceurl}', '${resourceorder}', '1', '${system}', '${remark}')
mapper.select: SELECT resource_id resourceid, resource_name resourcename, parent_resource_id parentresourceid, resource_url resourceurl, resource_type resourcetype, resource_order resourceorder FROM t_sys_resource WHERE resource_type = '1' AND parent_resource_id = (SELECT RESOURCE_ID FROM T_SYS_RESOURCE WHERE SYSTEM = #{system} AND RESOURCE_TYPE = 0) ORDER BY parent_resource_id, resource_order

SELECT DISTINCT r.resource_id resourceid, r.resource_name resourcename, r.parent_resource_id parentresourceid, r.resource_url resourceurl, r.resource_type resourcetype, r.resource_order resourceorder FROM t_sys_resource r
,t_sys_role_resource rr
WHERE 1 = 1
and rr.role_id in (${roleIds})
AND r.resource_id = rr.resource_id
AND r.resource_type = '1' AND r.parent_resource_id = #{id} ORDER BY r.resource_order
